posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
I have recently re-installed NWN from GOG and have noticed an issue. 
I can't see traps when they are placed on the ground, or when they are detected by myself or others.
I do see the trap indication on chests and doors. If I right click on the trap, the radial menu shows that I can remove or recover, but I can't see the red or green square. 

So far I have removed the override directory, reverted to an old nwn.ini and an old nwnplayer.ini. Does anyone know where and if there is a setting that turns on and off the trap graphic?

Additionally this happens on two different persistent worldws, so I am pretty sure it isnt something world related.
